quiz_content.instructions: Test your knowledge of Spanish subjunctive mood.

questions.question_text: What is the present subjunctive form of 'hablar' for 'yo'?
questions.explanation: Present subjunctive: -ar verbs change to -e endings

questions.question_text: What is the present subjunctive form of 'comer' for 'tú'?
questions.explanation: Present subjunctive: -er verbs change to -a endings

questions.question_text: Complete: 'Espero que él _____ (venir) mañana.'
questions.explanation: After 'espero que' use subjunctive: venir → venga

questions.question_text: What is the present subjunctive form of 'ser' for 'nosotros'?
Complete: 'Dudo que ellos _____ (tener) razón.'
questions.explanation: After 'dudo que' use subjunctive: tener → tengan

questions.question_text: What is the present subjunctive form of 'ir' for 'ella'?
Complete: 'Es importante que tú _____ (estudiar).'
What is the present subjunctive form of 'hacer' for 'yo'?
Complete: 'No creo que _____ (llover) hoy.'
What is the present subjunctive form of 'poder' for 'ustedes'?
Which expression requires subjunctive?
questions.explanation: 'Ojalá que' expresses hope and requires subjunctive

questions.question_text: Complete: 'Quiero que vosotros _____ (venir).'
questions.explanation: After 'quiero que' use subjunctive: venir → vengáis

questions.question_text: What is the present subjunctive form of 'dar' for 'tú'?
Complete: 'Me alegro de que _____ (estar) bien.'
questions.explanation: After 'me alegro de que' use subjunctive

questions.question_text: What is the present subjunctive form of 'saber' for 'ellos'?
Complete: 'Es posible que nosotros _____ (salir).'
What is the present subjunctive form of 'decir' for 'yo'?
Complete: 'Temo que él no _____ (llegar) a tiempo.'
What is the present subjunctive form of 'poner' for 'ella'?
Complete: 'Ojalá que _____ (haber) tiempo.'
questions.explanation: After 'ojalá que' use subjunctive: haber → haya
